body.p: The long wait is over, Gentoo Linux 2005.1 has been released last week! Learn all about its features and where to get it from this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, along with a report from the first Gentoo developer conference webcast! Other events covered in this issue: The GentooSummerCamp in Germany and a Free Software event in London, plus the regular sections with press clippings, news from the developer community, and bugzilla statistics. Interestingly enough, this must have been a safer week than ever for Linux security: for the first time ever, this GWN has no GLSAs to report! Enjoy reading.
